original_text: Before I came, you had only a few sheep and goats. Now you have many more valuable things. Wherever I have worked for you, the Lord has blessed you. But now I want to work to help my own family. I must do that soon.’
korean_text: 내가 오기 전에는 외삼촌의 소유가 적더니 번성하여 떼를 이루었으니 내 발이 이르는 곳마다 여호와께서 외삼촌에게 복을 주셨나이다 그러나 나는 언제나 내 집을 세우리이까

sentences.original_text: you had only a few sheep and goats
Now you have many more valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너에게는 훨씬 더 많은 귀중한 것들이 있다

sentences.original_text: Wherever I have worked for you
But now I want to work
